title: DANISH ENDURANCE Hiking Socks, Winter Socks, Merino Wool Socks, Anti Blister, Cushioned, Crew Socks for Men & Women, 3-Pack
description: Merino wool comfort: Our socks with thermoregulating merino wool and sweat wicking ventilation lanes ensure that your feet stay fresh, dry and comfortable in any weather
Outdoor design: Our hiking socks feature targeted cushioning to reduce the risk of blisters and sore feet. Great for hiking, trekking, outdoor adventures, walking, traveling or everyday
Made in Europe: Our hiking socks are designed with Everest mountaineer Rasmus Kragh who tests our products to ensure high quality standards. The socks are fairly produced in Portugal

Transition to sustainable materials: 38% Merino Wool, 30% Acrylic, 30% Polyamide, 2% Elastane. Composition may vary during transition. Animal friendly sourcing. Machine washable (max/105°F). No tumble dry
Excellent customer support: We want our customers to be happy - If you have any questions about this product, do not hesitate to contact us. Our team is always ready to help you
